publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4369 Bruce Crawford: ME Awareness Week—That the Parliament recognises ME Awareness Week, from 8 to 15 May 2006, and ME Awareness Day on Friday 12 May 2006; acknowledges the concerns of ME sufferers that there remains an unacceptable imbalance in the funding for research into this debilitating disease; further notes that the Strategic Needs Assessment Programme for ME sufferers in Scotland, which was announced by the Scottish Executive over a year ago, appears to be no further forward, and repeats its belief that a centre of excellence is essential in order to utilise professional expertise in this field to the fullest extent. Supported by: Alex Fergusson*
